name: My First Easy Cheesy Mexican Roll-Up
author: Uncle Ben's
summary: Chicken, rice, black beans, and cheese rolled up in a tortilla make an easy, healthy, and tasty recipe for a child's first cooking lesson.
ingredients: 1 (8.8 ounce) pouch UNCLE BEN'S® Ready Rice® Garden Vegetable
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (6 ounce) package fully cooked oven-roasted diced chicken breast (like Tyson® Grilled and Ready®)
directions: Prepare rice according to package directions
Top each tortilla with rice, black beans, diced chicken breast, and shredded cheese
Fold tortilla in half or roll burrito style and heat in microwave for about 30 seconds for each individual burrito
